contents.name: quanzi
contents.contents: My first project in sohu -> Quanzi. Inspird By Reddit, we want to build our own reddit. The order of topics is totally depends on user's action.(such as comment count like count dislike count ..) The user can just view their favourite topics by joining the specific 'quanzi'. We build a system(Naive Bayes and log the user's passing rate) that can filter the bad topics automatically.
